name: Sirius B - Lift 7
description:
Greetings, loader. We have a resupply request from the outer crust of Sirius B. You'll be taking lift 7 up to fulfill that request. As the fauna of Sirius B is exceptionally aggressive, you have been equipped with a Laser Action Rifle and a grappling apparatus. Good luck, and remember always to go up!

This is Team Grape Crush's first game jam. We learned unity from scratch in a week so expect bugs :)

https://andrewyx.itch.io/

https://tmzero.itch.io/

Assets Used:

Super Grotto Escape Pack - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/super-grotto-escape-pack-238393 

Warped Shooting Fx - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/abstract/warped-shooting-fx-195246 

Super Pixel Cave Tileset - https://untiedgames.itch.io/super-pixel-cave-tileset Electronic Music Songpack - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/electronic-music-songpack-214055 

Arcade Game BGM #17 - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/arcade-game-bgm-17-210775 

Vehicle - Essentials - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/transportation/vehicle-essentials-194951 

Monster SFX - 111518 - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/monster-sfx-111518-132868 

Free Sound Effects Pack - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-sound-effects-pack-155776 

Modern Soundtrack Music Trap Style - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/modern-soundtrack-music-trap-style-183778 

Industrial Zone Tileset Pixel Art - https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-industrial-zone-tileset-pixel-art/
